subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: On May 25, 1994, the Devils, with Martin Brodeur as goalie, blew a two-goal lead with 22 minutes left in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference finals, and the visiting Rangers came back to win, 4-2.
snippet: On May 25, 1994, the Devils, with Martin Brodeur as goalie, blew a two-goal lead with 22 minutes left in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference finals, and the visiting Rangers came back to win, 4-2.
